both cm and in 3 the steps for the snood are sectioned separately for better understanding 4 the pattern is very easy and can be worked by absolute beginners 5 we crochet holding 2 strands of yarn throughout the whole project 6 it s crocheted in a straight piece like a scarf and then joined in the end 7 you can work this project in just one color or pick any colors you prefer to make it striped how to start the 1st stitch in a row of double_crochet 1 chain 1 and turn work work 1 single_crochet in the 1st of the row 2 put your crochet hook in the front left loop of the single_crochet and work one more single_crochet by doing this we work 1 single_crochet on top of the other and we have the equal height of a double_crochet 3 enid s snood by kiki crochet patterns copyright 2023 3 how to start the 1st stitch in a row of trebles work the same steps as we do to start the row of double_crochet and for the trebles we will repeat the step one more this means that we will work 3 single_crochet on top of each other in the pics below i show where to place the last single_crochet changing colors when we change colors in order to have a nice result when working the last st of row whatever that st is work the last 2 loops with the new color this way we have the new color attached but the last st of the row seems as if it s completed with the previous one 4 enid s snood by kiki
